author: sussman
msg: Fix issue #589.  Thanks to Philip Martin for analyzing this bug.
and date come back as NULL, don't turn them into stringbufs; just
push NULL values at the wc editor.
* mod_dav_svn/update.c (close_helper): if the author or date are NULL,
then output "" as the property value (xml cdata).  On the client
end, these should still come across as NULL by expat.
update editor receives an 'svn:wc:entry:" property with NULL value,
then set the entry attribute's value to "".
